extendedInfo.description: INCREASE YOUR BATTERY LIFE. This is a widget to toggle the data connection on/off. Disable the data connection when you don't need it, it will increase your battery life. NOTE: * This is a WIDGET, you can't find it in the App list, but in the Widget list. To add it to your home screen, push "Menu" button on home screen, select "Add"->"Widgets"->"DataSwitch".* For Android 4.0: Android 4.0 has a bug, Widgets sometimes don't appear in the widget list after installation, in that case, reboot your phone, then you will find it in the widget list.

reviews.title: Data Switch by Hongyu
reviews.comment: Seems to be working great on my DroidX. It showed up as  a widget. It is now  on my home page. Very convenient.  Great APP  Thanks.
reviews.author: Jeffrey deWeever

reviews.title: Impressed
reviews.comment: So often widget and apps don\'t do what they say. This downloaded quickly. Was in my widget option so put straight on screen. Toggles data traffic on and off instantly. Our 3G signal is this area is not working at mo so constantly have to switch to 2G by turning data off. I know can be done in phone settings but this does it oneclick instant. Good work devs.
reviews.author: Nicki Fletcher

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: it keeps turning back on. It\'s terrible. I though it would end my problems but... nope.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!!!  Thank you!!! ;D
reviews.comment: I love it!!! No frills, not complicated. Easy, fast and SMALL!! Unlike other Data on/off switches that claim to turn your data on & off with 1 click, it\'s actually 2, then you\'ve got to get back to your home screen.  This one is ACTUALLY ONE CLICK right from your home screen!!!  A MUST HAVE WIDGET!
reviews.author: M Strickland

reviews.title: Great, if not for one problem
reviews.comment: Most of the time I try to turn off/on my data with this widget and it doesn\'t react to my click.. or if it does, it takes a full minute to acknowledge my click before working. Instead I find myself deleting the widget and bringing it back to the home page to \"reset\" the widget, then it works
reviews.author: SportchekJustin

reviews.title: Diddnt work
reviews.comment: Did not show up in my Widgets list so could not use it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thought was perfect
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t automatically turn off when I get home to my wifi. That\'d be my only compliant, if I forget to hit the switch 3g stays connected as if wifi doesn\'t exist
reviews.author: shawn tane

reviews.title: works great
reviews.comment: It\'s simple, elegant and easy to use. Works great!! When data connection is on, it shows blue color instead of green. Would be great if you could change it to green as shown in the app screenshot. Nevertheless, 5 stars.. no doubt.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works!
reviews.comment: A better looking widget button would make this app priceless tho.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: THIS APP MUST BE HAVE 10 STAR...******************
reviews.comment: A VERY GOOD APP TO ON/OFF YOUR INTERNET CONNEFCTION. THIS SAVE MY BIG HEADACHE TO GO TO THE M,ENU & OFF THE DATA TO SAVE MY BATT & DATA...EVERY ONE MUST HAVE THIS...BIG THANX TO MR.WANG....
reviews.author: VIKAS GROVER

reviews.title: It works as charm
reviews.comment: 1st try it seems not getting anything w install just after installed other widget. Strange but since then it works... nexus s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I am amazed
reviews.comment: As if saving battery wasnt enough, all my games run without an ad at all. This little widget is now the most important one i have. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and Effective
reviews.comment: Simply awesome..this is what we want to who are on limited data plans.One suggestion try to change the skin,would really appreciate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5star
reviews.comment: I gave 5 star for this app.... Simply because it is simple...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than expected
reviews.comment: I was expecting a shortcut to my mobile setting but no. This widget is automatic. Very nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy one
reviews.comment: Great app. Suggestion : It would be great if the icon is same size like rest of the ones in Android, as this one is slightly bigger.
reviews.author: Sashidharan V

reviews.title: The working one.
reviews.comment: Its straightforward. Click ON, click OFF. 4 stars since its hard to blend it into the theme :) It comes only in black.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply works and useful
reviews.comment: I replaced built-in Sony\' switcher with this.
reviews.author: Mochamad Aris Zamroni

reviews.title: Simple and easy / Simple et facile
reviews.comment: What I love with this widget is his use simplicity. You put it on your android desktop and that\'s it. It work like a charm. For the lack of customization, I gave a 4 stars. It\'s really the only one lack of this app. / Ce que j\'aime de ce gadget est sa simplicit\303\251 d\'utilisation. Il fonctionne comme un charme. Pour le manque de personnalisation, j\'ai donn\303\251 un 4 \303\251toiles. C\'est vraiment le seul manque \303\240 cette app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Saw a mobile data switch on a friend\'s s3 and instantly wanted one. Now I have one!
reviews.author: A Google User
